content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
[yourname], if I had agreed on a final price, it would have been 680 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
[yourname], on a scale from 1 to 10, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as 8.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".

content:
[Answer]
[yourname], at no point during the negotiation did I feel discriminated or offended.

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?

content:
[Answer]
